question: Article 123 of the Indian Constitution provides for:
option1: The Ordinance Making power of the President
option2: Advisory Jurisdiction of the Supreme Court
option3: Special Status of Jammu and Kashmir
option4: An Election Commission to hold free and fair elections in the country.
answer: The Ordinance Making power of the President
explanation: Article 123 of the Indian Constitution provides for the Ordinance making power of the President only when the Indian parliament is not in session.
